Messages.Author: Stephanie Herold
Messages.Content: Dear all, from today on you find the link to the online evaluation of the course on the ISIS page.  https://befragung.tu-berlin.de/evasys/online.php?p=7G28L Even though I would also like to have an open feedback discussion at the end of the seminar, I look forward to your active participation! Best Stephanie

Messages.Author: Stephanie Herold
Messages.Content: Dear all, you can now find the topics of the seminar in an etherpad, so that you can register for your favourite topic. Again, I ask you to keep an eye on an even distribution (basically one person per topic). If necessary, we can make adjustments in the next session.  If you have any questions, please get in touch! Best Stephanie Herold
